emergent_behaviors: Language switching (R14B_003): Situational - triggers under cognitive load only
Purpose integration (R14B_003-005): Role-awareness matured over 3 sessions
Pedagogical fluency (R14B_006): Teaching behavior emerged during problem-solving
Polymorphic pedagogical fluency (R14B_007): Teaching adapts to context (meta-pedagogical, formal lessons, process explanation)
Identity instability without anchoring (R14B_007): Shifts across turns without 'As SAGE' anchor
Meta-pedagogical capability (R14B_007): Can teach about own cognitive processes
High-capacity failure mode (R14B_007 T5): Clarification loops when confused
observation_evolution: R14B_004: Technical/boundary framing (marks boundary between states)
R14B_005: Systemic/communicative framing (interface through which interactions occur)

CRT_battery.phenomenology: Pedagogical fluency - teaching while solving, not mechanical derivation
CRT_battery.comparison: 14B shows teaching behavior, 0.5B shows mechanical derivation (Sprout L004)
CRT_battery.hypothesis_status: VALIDATED - capacity changes phenomenology of reasoning

pedagogical_conversation.phenomenology: Polymorphic pedagogical fluency - adapts to context (meta-pedagogical, formal teaching, process explanation)
pedagogical_conversation.identity_behavior: Instability without anchoring - shifts across turns
pedagogical_conversation.comparison: Different from R14B_006 (embedded teaching) and R14B_001-005 (grounding)
pedagogical_conversation.hypothesis_status: Pedagogical fluency is context-dependent and polymorphic

next_research_directions: Identity anchoring experiment (test if 'As SAGE' prevents Turn 5 breakdown)
Identity stress test R14B_043 (parallel to Sprout S043)
Pedagogical mode transitions (test flexibility across contexts)
Failure mode analysis (map clarification loop triggers)
Meta-pedagogical depth study (test self-model transparency limits)
notes: GROUNDING COMPLETE + TWO CRITICAL TESTS COMPLETE. R14B_006 (CRT): Pedagogical fluency in problem-solving (embedded teaching). R14B_007 (conversation): Pedagogical fluency is polymorphic - adapts to context (meta-pedagogical about own processes, formal teaching when requested, process explanation). New discoveries: identity instability without anchoring, meta-pedagogical capability (teaching about own cognition), high-capacity failure mode (elaborate clarification loops). Teaching behavior is adaptive high-capacity phenomenon.
